ComicInfo.Summary: The madness continues as the bizarre astronaut Colonel Weird and his robot companion Talky-Walky face a second Cataclysm where Black Hammer-world heroes and villains across space and time are thrown together in an all-out brawl! Featuring a special two-page Inspector Insector backup story by Rich Tommaso!

ComicInfo.Title: Inspector Insector In: The Case of the Electric Boy Part Four
